description: An absent minded genius in Ebihara Chinami`s class. He is the head and only member in the Science Research club, and can always be found in the club room. At first he notices Ebihara Chinami`s abilities and pressures her to allow him to study them. Eventually through a series of comic misunderstandings he comes to realise that he has feelings for Ebihara Chinami.
name: Kannagi Koutarou
